content: You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Pietro., Pietro just said to you: '"Ah, good work, Lorenzo! That was handled swiftly."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Pietro. Glad to be of service."

You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Pietro., Pietro just said to you: '"Ah, grazie, Lorenzo! Much appreciated, that's a load off my mind."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Pietro! Glad to help. Just doing my duty."
